pages.text: Specials What’s Cookin’ Check out Grimaldi’s promotions and specials, from our seasonal menu and promotions, to Tuesday Tastings, to our military / veteran discount and more! New – Winter Seasonal Menu! Festive Flavors The Duo Pizza Cherry Pecan Salad Black Cherry Cheesecake REESE’S® Peanut Butter Cup Cheesecake Cran-Cherry Twist (non-alcoholic) Black Cherry Spritz Rye On Time View Menu Order Now For a Limited time. Stoking Social Hour* is Back! 3pm-5pm Daily While we stoke our famous coal brick ovens, we invite you to come socialize and enjoy these exciting deals! Signature Cocktails $10 Starters & Salads $3 Off Beer, Spritzes, Mocktails, Wine** & Sangria** $2 Off Bottles of Wine** $10 Off *Not available in South Carolina or at the Palazzo in Las Vegas. Must be 21+ to purchase or consume alcohol. Offers valid for dine-in only. Price and selection may vary by location. **On Tuesdays, Enjoy 50% Off Wine & Sangria All Day! Reserve wines excluded from 50% off offer. Find a Location Slices ASAP! Join us Monday – Friday from 11am – 3pm for a delicious lunch with Grimaldi’s Slices ASAP! Perfect for a fast yet satisfying meal, our coal-fired slices are ready in a New York minute. Choose from a giant white or red slice, a house or Caesar salad, and a refreshing soda or iced tea to create your ideal lunch. Pick Your Perfect Lunch: – $10.99 Slice, Salad, & Drink Combo – $7.49 Slice & Drink Combo – $4 Slice Only Add your favorite toppings to any slice for just $0.75 each. Not Available at Brooklyn or Palazzo locations. ORDER ONLINE Find a Location New Game Alert: “Ready, Set, Dough!” Fulfill your pizza orders from hungry customers before time runs out and keep them coming back for more of Grimaldi’s famous Coal-fired, Brick-oven pizzas. Do you have what it takes to go from Cheese the Day to Mozzarella Millionaire? Time to find out! Climb your way to the top of the leaderboard by unlocking our endless challenge mode: “Brooklyn Blitz.” Play Now Tuesday Tastings Every Tuesday, guests 21+ can enjoy half off glasses and bottles of wine, as well as glasses of sangria at participating locations. Dine-in only. Find A Location Participating Locations only Thank You, Military Members! In support of our military service members and veterans, we offer 15% off every day of the year! Must show ID. Available for dine-in or call-in takeout only. Find A Location Participating Locations only Earn Points On Every Order Get The Grimaldi's Pizzeria Rewards App Learn More Learn more about rewards

Mount Pleasant Open today: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Until 3:00pm By The Slice Address 1244 Belk Dr. Mt. Pleasant, SC 29464 843-971-9368 Store Hours Day Hours Sunday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Monday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Tuesday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Wednesday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Thursday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Friday 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Saturday 11:00 am - 10:00 pm Available Services Pick-up Delivery via partner site Free Wifi Group Dining Patio Seating Weekday Lunch Combo Area Manager Howard Barishhbarish@grimaldispizzeria.com Order Now Join Waitlist View Menu Directions Directions About Grimaldi's - Mount Pleasant Grimaldi’s Pizzeria in Mount Pleasant, SC brings the rich tradition of New York-style pizza—made the Brooklyn way—to the heart of the Lowcountry. Conveniently located at the main entrance of Mount Pleasant Towne Centre, just minutes from Charleston, our restaurant offers an authentic taste of one of New York’s most iconic culinary treasures: coal-fired brick oven pizza. At Grimaldi’s, pizza isn’t just a meal—it’s an experience. Our hand-tossed dough is made fresh in-house every day, using our time-honored ‘secret recipe’ to achieve the perfect texture and flavor. Each pizza is topped with our signature sauce, premium mozzarella, and your favorite toppings, then baked to perfection in our coal-fired ovens. This unique cooking method creates a crisp yet chewy crust with that unmistakable, slightly smoky flavor that defines true Brooklyn-style pizza. Our Mount Pleasant location offers a welcoming and family-friendly atmosphere with a touch of New York nostalgia. Guests can choose to dine indoors beneath our signature wine bottle chandeliers or relax outside on our covered patio, which is pet-friendly and equipped with fans for warm summer days. We also feature a full-service bar with indoor and outdoor seating, perfect for pairing your pizza with a glass of wine or a craft cocktail. For those on the go, we make takeout easy with a convenient pick-up station located just inside our side entrance. Ample parking is available in both the front and rear of the building, making your visit as easy and enjoyable as possible. Whether you’re a local from Mount Pleasant or visiting from Charleston, Grimaldi’s is your destination for authentic New York-style pizza. Join us and discover why our coal-fired, brick oven pizzas are the best in the Charleston area! Let’s Plan Your Next Event Plan your next group dining event with Grimaldi’s Pizzeria. Whether you’re celebrating moms, dads, grads, birthdays or any special occasion, celebrate with pizza from Grimaldi’s. Minimum of 8 guests and 72 hour notice for booking. Menu Whether you’re looking to have lunch or dinner, Grimaldi’s has options for everyone! Our menu gives you a taste of our signature Coal Brick-Oven pizza and calzones baked to perfection. Pizzas Pizzas Starters Drinks Mille Gradi° Desserts Seasonal Coal Brick-Oven Pizza Sizes 12″ / 16″ / 18″* * Pizzas are hand-stretched to measurement. Overall size may shrink during cooking. Traditional Pizza Our classic pizza with secret recipe tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella and garnish of basil. Topped with our signature cheese and spice blend. Order Now Details about Traditional Pizza White with Garlic Pizza Extra fresh mozzarella, garlic, and an olive oil drizzle and garnish of basil. Topped with our signature cheese and spice blend. Calzone Hand tossed dough stuffed with ricotta cheese, oregano, black pepper, romano cheese and fresh parsley. Order Now Details about Calzone Gluten Friendly Crust **Our gluten-friendly and cauliflower crusts have a gluten content of less than 20ppm based on information provided by our ingredient suppliers; however, we cannot guarantee that pizzas made with these crusts will be gluten-free as we prepare all of our pizzas in a common kitchen with a risk of gluten exposure. In addition, certain toppings contain gluten. We do not recommend these pizzas for guests with Celiac Disease. Guests with gluten sensitivities should exercise judgment in consuming these pizzas.
